Posts.Content: Dear Freinds My mom got breast cancer 1 and half yr ago and after 6 session chemotherapy she started to get Aromacin . 6 months after Aromacin starting she got hard cough like like asthma  but it was mistaken as allergic matters by her doctor any way recently after near 8 months  while she is losing her weight day by day   and changing her oncologist we found out that there are lot of  metastasis to her various organs .   She is starting chemotherapy by today but I am really hopeless and intend to know if there is any same case who has survived after these lot of problems after chemotherapy/. Shary
Posts.Title: metastasis to lung liver and liver
